description: Standardized Error State Mapping (ESM) for SMC transitions, defining standard resolution paths for known faults.

E999_SYSTEM_HALT.message: Critical system halt detected. Integrity failure.

E100_AUTH_FAILURE.message: Resource allocation or initial signature verification failed.

E200_ENV_SETUP_FAIL.message: Required external/internal environment setup (TEMM/ECVM) could not be finalized.

E400_FINALITY_ABORT.message: P-01 finality commit failed due to inconsistency or integrity failure.
